scripts.start:demo: cross-env PLATFORMS='react,cssModules' SRC_PATH='demo' STATIC_PATH='public' node node_modules/webpack-digest/src/app.js
scripts.start:demo:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PLATFORMS='react,cssModules' PORT=8090 SRC_PATH='demo' STATIC_PATH='public' node node_modules/webpack-digest/src/app.js
scripts.start:demo:gitlab: cross-env PLATFORMS='react,cssModules' SRC_PATH='demo' STATIC_PATH='public' INDEX='demo/index.gitlab.htm' node node_modules/webpack-digest/src/app.js
